alert.note: Alert for Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf and southwestern Liberty Counties through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 318 PM EDT/218 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wewahitchka, or 20 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Lewis, Chipola Cutoff, Dalkeith and Willis Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
